plot: Burned skin is the problem of the emigraci internal n between regions with different levels of development. In a village on the Costa Brava, a dawn il begins his day's work. At the same time, in a village of Andaluc a, his wife and their two children started the trip to meet with l. After a few months in solitary, man has managed to rent a place to live. A small adventure with a Belgian Tourist discover you an unsuspected world.
